title: Phenomenological Approach-Based Elementary Science Concept Deepening Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of elementary science curriculum concepts and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Practical education program for in-service elementary teachers to enhance science concept comprehension

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the multidimensional meanings of scientific concepts by applying phenomenological research methods.
Learners can collaborate with peers to develop qualitative research tools for observing students' concept formation processes.
Learners can propose at least three instructional strategies applicable to science lesson design based on research findings.

resources: Image Resources for Observing Scientific Phenomena
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
